short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Mini Crossword right on Chrome Browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Mini Crossword game by The New York Times is a popular word puzzle. A new Mini Crossword puzzle is released every day, with more challenges for you.

You can play the Mini Crossword on The New York Times website or via their mobile app.

The goal of the Mini Crossword is to fill in the entire 5x5 grid with correct words by solving clues provided for both across and down directions.

Each puzzle comes with a set of clues for the words that fit horizontally (across) and vertically (down).

Each day a new Mini Crossword is released. Select the current day's puzzle to start.
